Title: typo3 Security fix for Flow Swift Mailer package
Description: A remote code execution vulnerability has been found in the Swift Mailer library (swiftmailer/swiftmailer) recently. See this advisory for details. If you are not using the default mail() transport, this particular problem  does not affect you. Upgrading is of course still recommended!
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.1.0 before 4.1.99, all versions starting from 5.4.0 before 5.4.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.1.0, all versions starting from 4.1.99 before 5.4.0, all versions starting from 5.4.5
